columns.name: delivery_stream_name
columns.description: The name of the delivery stream.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the delivery stream.

columns.name: delivery_stream_status
columns.description: The server-side encryption type used on the stream.

columns.name: version_id
columns.description: The version id of the stream. Each time the destination is updated for a delivery stream, the version ID is changed, and the current version ID is required when updating the destination

columns.name: create_timestamp
columns.description: The date and time that the delivery stream was created.

columns.name: has_more_destinations
columns.description: Indicates whether there are more destinations available to list.

columns.name: last_update_timestamp
columns.description: The date and time that the delivery stream was last updated.

columns.name: delivery_stream_encryption_configuration
columns.description: Indicates the server-side encryption (SSE) status for the delivery stream.

columns.name: failure_description
columns.description: Provides details in case one of the following operations fails due to an error related to KMS: CreateDeliveryStream, DeleteDeliveryStream, StartDeliveryStreamEncryption,StopDeliveryStreamEncryption.

columns.name: source
columns.description: If the DeliveryStreamType parameter is KinesisStreamAsSource, a SourceDescription object describing the source Kinesis data stream.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with the delivery stream.
